title: Dragon NaturallySpeaking beeps after each recognition during voice dictation since last update version 110
content: I use the voice dictation program called Dragon NaturallySpeaking to do most of my typing and navigate through webpages. After Firefox updated to version 110 it now beeps after each word, phrase or sentence I dictate. Dragon NaturallySpeaking has settings where you can turn this on and off, and I have it turned off but it still beeps. Wondering if there are any fixes or if I can go to a previous version. Thanks!
creator: injured_cowboy

title: while using Bypass Paywalls Clean v3.0.4.0 in Firefox photos in stories will not open
content: While using Bypass Paywalls Clean v3.0.4.0 add-on in Firefox photos in stories will not open. It worked before so I contacted the add-on maker and after the last contact he called me a troll and blocked me. But still the problem happens when a story has photos I use to be able to click on the View icon and the photos would open in a new tab now nothing happens. I am using Firefox 88.0b9 (64-bit) because I do not like the changes the newer versions have and this version works well and has opened the photos before this problem started. I have added a grab of a story with photos to show the View icon. I understand I am cheating by using the Bypass but if I subscribed to all the sites I visit I would go bankrupt. Any help greatly appreciated.
creator: phillstroud
